extDescription.message: Restores the Dim (dark blue) background option to X/Twitter display settings.

settingsHint.message: You can also toggle this from Settings → Display.

welcomeSubtitleInstall.message: X Dim Mode brings back the Dim dark blue theme that X removed — and adds a lot more.

welcomeHeadingUpdate.message: X Dim Mode just got better

welcomeSubtitleUpdate.message: Thanks for sticking with us. Here's what's new:

installFeature1.message: Restores X's Dim dark blue background

installFeature2.message: Pick from 6 color themes — all easy on the eyes

installFeature3.message: Works across X and X Pro

installFeature5.message: Toggle it from the popup icon or from Settings → Display

updateFeature1.message: New: 6 color themes — all just as easy on the eyes

updateFeature2.message: New: Custom color picker — choose any hue you want

updateFeature4.message: Improved: Now covers DMs and more pages across X

updateFeature5.message: Improved: Auto light/dark switching with your system theme

updateFeature6.message: Fixed: Search bar, scrollbar, and various display bugs

emailHeading.message: Want a say in what we build next?

emailSuccess.message: You're in! We'll keep you posted.

emailError.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.
